epd_metadata.declared_product: cement products produced by Holcim Argentina
epd_metadata.sub_pcr: Product Category Rules (PCR) for ISO 14025 Type III Environmental Product Declarations (EPD) of Portland, Blended, Masonry, Mortar and Plastic (stucco) Cements
epd_metadata.third_party_verifier: Geoffrey Guest, Certified 3rd Party Verifier under the CSA group

product_description.company_description: Holcim Argentina belongs to the Holcim Group and is a world leader in innovative and sustainable solutions for construction.
product_description.product_classification: UN CPC Group 3744-Cement or CSI MasterFormat Division 03 30 00 Cast-in-Place Concrete

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules

data_sources_and_quality.raw_material_transport: Combination of actual mode/distance combinations and ecoinvent default multi-modal market mix distances
data_sources_and_quality.electricity: Direct reported from Holcim Argentina records
data_sources_and_quality.process_space_heating: No fuel used for space heating
data_sources_and_quality.fuel_required_for_machinery: Determined from direct Holcim information for gasoline
data_sources_and_quality.direct_a3_emissions_accounting: Based on primary fuel reporting from Holcim Argentina

additional_info.environmental_indicators_and_inventory_m: Supports the life cycle impact assessment indicators and inventory metrics as listed in the tables.
additional_info.limitations: This EPD is a declaration of potential environmental impact and does not support or provide definitive comparisons of the environmental performance of specific products.
